chapters.title: Chapter 11: An Oath
chapters.info: Aeldene Stonebridge, p. 211 (261)—Aes Sedai of the Blue Ajah. She was born in an Andoran mining village in the Mountains of Mist, and has a crooked nose that she is rumored to have gotten from fighting with her fists as a girl. She is now the head of the Blue Ajah's network of eyes-and-ears; she took over when Siuan was raised Amyrlin. She recently tried to weasel the Amyrlin's eyes-and-ears out of Siuan for the Blue Ajah; Siuan refused to budge even a millimeter.
